participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and resilient, trying to make the best of a tough situation as a single parent.
participant_1.background: i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: playful and imaginative, with a quirky view of the world.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

content.text: O, l like to become a tree
